page.title: 02A Shiskine Girl's Day 8/6/85
page.content: I'm Catriona Robertson from Shedock Farm, Shiskine. On Saturday I rose at 9.30am and watched some T.V and then dressed in tee shirt,trousers and jumper. I had an orange,toast and tea for breakfast. My friend came round to play and we went to the pool. When I came back I had French toast for my lunch. After lunch I went out to play with my friend. I came in at 3.00pm to raid the house for biscuits and sweets My friend went home then. I sat and read until my tea was ready. For tea I had meat, vegetables and potatoes. After my tea I played round the farm. When I came in I had a bath. After my bath my Mum and Dad came up to the sitting-room and we all watched television together. At 9.30pm I went to bed _ the end of a lovely day! {**************************************
